title: Metric Record
description: JSON schema for metric logs emitted by the kube-transition-metrics controller

type.title: Metric type
type.description: The type of metric included in kube_transition_metrics

kube_namespace.title: Kubernetes Namespace name
kube_namespace.description: The name of the Kubernetes Namespace containing the pod

pod_name.title: Kubernetes Pod name
pod_name.description: The name of the Kubernetes Pod to which metrics pertain

kube_node.title: Kubernetes Node name
kube_node.description: The name of the Kubernetes Node running the Pod.

kube_qos.title: Kubernetes QOS class
kube_qos.description: The Kubernetes QOS class of the pod

kube_priority_class.title: Kubernetes Priority class
kube_priority_class.description: The Kubernetes Priority class of the Pod.

kube_runtime_class.title: Kubernetes Runtime class
kube_runtime_class.description: The Kubernetes Runtime class of the Pod.

kube_ownerref_kind.title: Kubernetes Owner Reference Kind
kube_ownerref_kind.description: The Kubernetes controller Kind of the Pod.

kube_ownerref_name.title: Kubernetes Owner Reference Name
kube_ownerref_name.description: The Kubernetes controller Name of the Pod.

kube_cronjob.title: Kubernetes CronJob
kube_cronjob.description: The Kubernetes CronJob of the pod (currently unsupported).

kube_daemon_set.title: Kubernetes DaemonSet
kube_daemon_set.description: The Kubernetes DaemonSet of the pod.

kube_deployment.title: Kubernetes Deployment
kube_deployment.description: The Kubernetes Deployment of the pod (currently unsupported).

kube_job.title: Kubernetes Job
kube_job.description: The Kubernetes Job of the pod.

kube_replica_set.title: Kubernetes ReplicaSet
kube_replica_set.description: The Kubernetes ReplicaSet of the pod.

kube_statefulset.title: Kubernetes StatefulSet
kube_statefulset.description: The Kubernetes StatefulSet of the pod.

kube_service.title: Kubernetes Service
kube_service.description: The Kubernetes Service pointing to the pod (currently unsupported).

kube_app_component.title: Kubernetes App Component
kube_app_component.description: The Kubernetes App Component of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/component).

kube_app_instance.title: Kubernetes App Instance
kube_app_instance.description: The Kubernetes App Instance of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/instance).

kube_app_managed_by.title: Kubernetes App Managed By
kube_app_managed_by.description: The Kubernetes App Managed By of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/managed-by).

kube_app_name.title: Kubernetes App Name
kube_app_name.description: The Kubernetes App Name of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/name).

kube_app_part_of.title: Kubernetes App Part Of
kube_app_part_of.description: The Kubernetes App Part Of of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/part-of).

kube_app_version.title: Kubernetes App Version
kube_app_version.description: The Kubernetes App Version of the pod (app.kubernetes.io/version).

container_name.title: Container name
container_name.description: The name of the container to which metrics pertain, only set for container and image_pull metrics types.

short_image.title: Short Image
short_image.description: The short image name for the container image (the last path component of the repository), only set for container and image_pull metrics types.

image_name.title: Image name
image_name.description: The name of the repository for the container image (everyting before tag and digest), only set for container and image_pull metrics types.

image_tag.title: Image tag
image_tag.description: The tag or digest of the container image, only set for container and image_pull metrics types.

pod.title: Pod Metrics
pod.description: Included if kube_transition_metric_type is equal to "pod".

creation_timestamp.title: Running Timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the Pod was created.

scheduled_timestamp.title: Scheduled Timestamp
scheduled_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the Pod was scheduled (Pending->Initializing state).

creation_to_scheduled_seconds.title: Pod Creation to Scheduled
creation_to_scheduled_seconds.description: The time in seconds it took to schedule the Pod.

initialized_timestamp.title: initialized Timestamp
initialized_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the Pod first entered Running state (all init containers exited successfuly and images are pulled). In the event of a pod restart this time is not reset.

creation_to_initialized_seconds.title: Pod Creation to Initialized
creation_to_initialized_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the pod creation to when it was initialized.

scheduled_to_initialized_seconds.title: Pod Scheduled to Initialized
scheduled_to_initialized_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the pod was scheduled to when it was initialized (Initializing->Running state).

ready_timestamp.title: Ready Timestamp
ready_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the Pod first became Ready (all containers had readinessProbe success). In the event of a pod restart this time is not reset.

creation_to_ready_seconds.title: Pod Creation to Ready
creation_to_ready_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the pod creation to becoming Ready.

initialized_to_ready_seconds.title: Pod Initialized to Ready
initialized_to_ready_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the pod was initialized (Running state) to when it first bacame Ready.

container.title: Container Metrics
container.description: Included if kube_transition_metric_type is equal to "container".

init_container.title: Init Container
init_container.description: True if the container is an init container, otherwise false.

previous_to_running_seconds.title: Previous Container Finished to Running
previous_to_running_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the previous init container becoming Ready (exited 0) to this container running. Only set for init containers, absent for the first init container.

initialized_to_running_seconds.title: Pod Initialized to Running
initialized_to_running_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the Pod becoming initialized (all init containers exited 0) to this container running. Only set for non-init containers.

running_timestamp.title: Running Timestamp
running_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the container first entered Running state (first fork(2)/execve(2) in container environment). In the event of a pod restart, this timestamp is NOT updated.

started_timestamp.title: Started Timestamp
started_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the container first started state (startupProbe success). In the event of a pod restart, this timestamp is NOT updated. Only set for non-init containers.

running_to_started_seconds.title: Running to Started
running_to_started_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the container becoming running to this container started. Only set for non-init containers.

ready_timestamp.title: Started Timestamp
ready_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the container first ready state (readinessProbe success). In the event of a pod restart, this timestamp is NOT updated.

running_to_ready_seconds.title: Running to Ready
running_to_ready_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the container becoming running to this container ready. In init containers, this is the time the container exited with a successful status.

started_to_ready_seconds.title: Running to Ready
started_to_ready_seconds.description: The time in seconds from the container becoming started to this container ready. Only set for non-init containers.

image_pull.title: Image Pull Metrics
image_pull.description: Included if kube_transition_metric_type is equal to "image_pull". Note that these metrics are only emitted in the event that an image pull occurs, if imagePullPolicy is set to IfNotPresent this will only occur if the image is not already present on the node.

already_present.title: Already Present
already_present.description: true if the image was already present on the machine, otherwise false.

started_timestamp.title: Started Timestamp
started_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the image pull was first initiated. This is obtained from the Event emitted by the Kubelet and may not be 100% accurate. In the event of ImagePullFailed this time is not reset for subsequent attempts.

finished_timestamp.title: Finished Timestamp
finished_timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the image pull was finished. This is obtained from the Event emitted by the Kubelet and may not be 100% accurate.

duration_seconds.title: Duration
duration_seconds.description: The duration in seconds to complete the image pull successfully. This is based purely off the started_timestamp and finished_timestamp, which themselves are based on Event timestamps which are rounded to seconds. The duration here may not match perfectly the duration seen in the kubelet image pull message, due to slight latency in reporting of image pull Events and truncation of timestamps to seconds.

time.title: Metric Timestamp
time.description: The time at which this metric was emitted.

message.title: Message
message.description: An additional message emitted along with metrics.
